name: Boogey Boy
description:
It’s time for bed and the boogeyman is out to get you! Can you escape your nightmares?

Boogey Boy is a 3D side-scrolling runner. Escape the boogeyman by collecting batteries to activate your flashlight. Play through the boy's dreamworlds, dodging strange and bizarre enemies. Activate special powerups to help the boy escape from the terrors of the night.

Story and Arcade mode
Play story mode to escape and defeat the boogeyman.
Play arcade mode and go for the high score.

Vibrant and colorful 3D stages
Make your way through five wild, whimsical stages.
The stages are random every time. Every play is new and exciting!

Activate powerful abilities
Defeat the monsters of the night with five different power-ups.
Use powerups to change the way you play!

In-app purchases
Just kidding. Pay once, play forever!

**NOTE: Optimized for iPad 2 and up, iPhone 4S and up.**

SlidDB top 50 of 2014

===== REVIEWS =====

“It is a colorful, action-filled platforming game that will easily draw you into its clutches” – Droidgamers

“Addictive platforming at it’s finest!” – Withinthegame

“A compelling platform runner for iOS”” – iphoneitalia

“My love for Boogey Boy comes from the art. The look is really dream-like and surreal” – Crotchetyoldgamer
